issue.title: run tests using PHPUnit 11.5
issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | 7.4
| Bug fix?      | no
| New feature?  | no
| Deprecations? | no
| Issues        | 
| License       | MIT

body:
Good catch, thanks.

I will implement

* `--do-not-fail-on-deprecation`
* `--do-not-fail-on-phpunit-deprecation`
* `--do-not-fail-on-empty-test-suite`
* `--do-not-fail-on-incomplete`
* `--do-not-fail-on-notice`
* `--do-not-fail-on-risky`
* `--do-not-fail-on-skipped`
* `--do-not-fail-on-warning`

for PHPUnit 10.5, PHPUnit 11.5, and PHPUnit 12.2 shortly. I decided to "backport" this as far back as PHPUnit 10.5 to make migration as easy as possible.

issue.title: CLI and XML option to not fail on PHPUnit warnings

labels.name: type/enhancement
labels.description: A new idea that should be implemented

body: This ticket should also get the label `version/10` I guess
@sebastianbergmann Thank you very much for this addition. As far as I can see the new options work as expected and will make the migration to PHPUnit > 9.6 for Symfony even easier.

issue.title: use PHPUnit 11.5 when we need to ignore deprecations
issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | 8.0
| Bug fix?      | no
| New feature?  | no
| Deprecations? | no
| Issues        | 
| License       | MIT

We need sebastianbergmann/phpunit#6239 to be able to use the `--do-not-fail-on-deprecation` option (so either 11.5 or 12.2+). Let's stick with 11.5 for now until our test suite is ready for 12.2 or 12.3.

issue.title: use PHPUnit 12.3 for the low and high deps jobs too
issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | 8.0
| Bug fix?      | no
| New feature?  | no
| Deprecations? | no
| Issues        | 
| License       | MIT

This reverts #61330 as we now use PHPUnit 12.3 by default which also contains the changes that implemented sebastianbergmann/phpunit#6239.
